data.actual_result: The app gets stuck on the search function with the keyboard and hangs until you restart the application.
data.expected_result: The app should join/switch to that server's channel.
data.short_description: Discord app hangs when attempting to join a server through an invite link when using search.
data.steps_to_repro: - Write a message containing an invite link. - Go to search and look for that message. - Press the message containing the invite link. - Press the link and attempt to join the server.
